text: Pterolophioides is a genus of longhorn beetles of the subfamily Lamiinae,Biolib.cz - Pterolophioides. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. containing the following species: * Pterolophioides camerunensis Breuning, 1967 * Pterolophioides guineensis Breuning, 1955 * Pterolophioides laterifuscus (Fairmaire, 1886) * Pterolophioides stramentosus Breuning, 1942 * Pterolophioides subunicolor Breuning, 1969 ==References== Category:Desmiphorini
title: Pterolophioides
